author: Nathaniel Taplin
title: A Trade War Might Be a Commodities Buying Opportunity - WSJ
text:
With the U.S. and China engaging in a tariff-slapping exchange, this might seem a terrible time for that most growth-sensitive of asset classes, commodities.
Investors shouldnâ€™t be too pessimistic.

Sure, oil and metals would likely sell off sharply at the outset of an actual trade war: Copper already has, falling around 4% in March. Still,...
